questList.questDescription: Form an alliance with the Frost Phantom Sentinels or eliminate them to secure safe passage through Whispering Frostfalls.
Find a way to unite the Frozen Wraith Legion to aid in your journey, promising peace between the living and the undead.
Defeat the Shimmering Snowfiends to establish dominance over the icy tundra and earn a powerful amulet of alliance.
Navigate the Shadowmaw Abyssals and either form a pact or eliminate them to proceed deeper into the Ethereal Shadow Caverns.
Unite the Darkened Echo Spirits to protect the Ethereal Shadow Caverns and receive an amulet of healing as a token of goodwill.
Confront the Shadowed Bane Seekers and eliminate their threat to establish your dominance in the caverns, earning an amulet of alliance as a reward.
Face Atheronius' minions, the Lava Shadowstalkers, to weaken the Ethereal Shadow Walker's influence and emerge victorious over the darkness.
Seek unity with the Infernoblade Keepers to balance the elements of fire and ice within Atheronius' Lair and receive a healing amulet in return.
Defeat the Pyroclasm Emberwings to break their hold on the volcanic fortress and earn an amulet of alliance to strengthen your resolve.
